name: Pixel Punk
description:
Pixel Punk is a strategy tower defence.
In pixel Punk you build different turrets that will protect you against the never ending waves.

In Pixel Punk you will start off with just the basic generator and some coins to purchase your first turrets. The game will start directly when you join the game.

When you start the game you will have a set amount of energy that you can spend. Use it wisely! Because when you are out of energy you will need to upgrade your generator or upgrade the turrets.
The turrets in the game use different amounts of energy and that's why not all turrets are good to use in the start but great to use in the end.

The waves start easy but ramps up to harder faster enemies.

The strategy in the game is to know where and when to place different turrets and also know when it is time to upgrade the generator.
